articles.title: Netflix expanding password-sharing crackdown with new test
articles.description: The feature will roll out for testing in Argentina, the Dominican Republic, Honduras, El Salvador, Guatemala on Aug. 22.
articles.content:
article
Netflix is expanding its efforts to crack down on password sharing with a new test in some Latin American countries.
Beginning Aug. 22, the streaming behemoth will unveil a new "add a home" option, which will charge users an extra monthly fee... [2633 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-Argentine Tagliafico joins Lyon from Ajax
articles.description:
Argentina defender Nicolas Tagliafico has joined Olympique Lyonnais from Ajax Amsterdam for 4.2 million euros ($4.29 million), the Ligue 1 club said on Saturday.
and whose position was one of the priorities for Peter Bosz and his staff for the coming season," the club said in a statement.
articles.content: Argentina defender Nicolas Tagliafico has joined Olympique Lyonnais from Ajax Amsterdam for 4.2 million euros ($4.29 million), the Ligue 1 club said on Saturday. Tagliafico, who has signed a three-year contract at Lyon, made more than 100 appearances... [532 chars]

articles.description: In telling his diplomatic story Keogh recounts the history of the Irish community in Argentina as well as the country it settled in

articles.title: Argentina and Chile mountain border reopens after heavy snowfall
articles.description:
Some of the drivers had been waiting for days. The long waits provoked widespread anger among drivers.
"The authorities, the agencies are not concerned, both on the Argentinean and Chilean side, about improving the infrastructure, we are tired of complaining a thousand times," said Angel, a 42-year-old bus driver.
articles.content: The main mountain border pass between Chile and Argentina reopened this week after a heavy snowfall in the Andes forced it to shutter for about two weeks, stranding thousands of trucks. The backed-up vehicles have been slowly wending their way along ... [508 chars]

articles.title: Mossad Sheds New Light on Argentina Terrorist Attacks in 1990s
articles.description: An investigation by the Israeli spy agency found that Hezbollah had set up a cell to conduct the attacks and rejected suspicions that Argentines or Iranian officials in Buenos Aires had been involved.
articles.content: TEL AVIV — Two terrorist attacks on Israeli and Jewish targets in Buenos Aires in the 1990s that killed scores of people were carried out by a secret Hezbollah unit whose operatives, contrary to widespread claims, were not abetted knowingly by Argent... [791 chars]

articles.title: Dollar-strapped Argentina to loosen foreign exchange rules for tourists
articles.description: Argentina will allow foreign tourists to exchange dollars at a significantly higher rate than previously available, the Ministry of Economy said on Thursday, as the country reckons with depleted foreign currency reserves. "Argentina needs the dollars brought in by tourists," Minister of Tourism Matias Lammens told journalists on Wednesday before the measure was announced.
articles.content:
Argentina will allow foreign tourists to exchange dollars at a significantly higher rate than previously available, the Ministry of Economy said on Thursday, as the country reckons with depleted foreign currency reserves.

articles.title: Rugby-Argentina name squad for Rugby Championship clashes against Australia
articles.description: There are returns to the squad for tighthead prop Santiago Medrano, loose forward Joaquin Oviedo and centre Lucas Mensa, while second rower Guido Petti and winger Bautista Delguy are being rested for later clashes in the southern hemisphere championship against New Zealand and South Africa. Argentina host Australia in Mendoza on Aug. 6, and in San Juan on Aug. 13.
articles.content: Argentina have included captain Julian Montoya and the first-choice halfback pairing of Tomas Cubelli and Nicolas Sanchez in a 34-man squad for the two tests against Australia in the Rugby Championship, the Argentine Rugby Union said on Thursday. Coa... [2191 chars]
